name: electric razor
description: This is a pocket-sized electric razor for fast and safe shaving.  You can use it to shave if it's supplied with batteries.  It requires 10 batteries per use.

name: large press
description: Large press that can be used to glue wooden parts together under pressure.

name: pair of welding goggles
description: A dark pair of goggles.  They make seeing very difficult, but protect you from bright flashes. Use them to move to your forehead.

name: pair of welding goggles (forehead)
description: A dark pair of goggles, weared on the forehead. Can't protect from bright flashes in this state. Use them to cover your eyes.
